verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Hew<WH6458> you two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like to the first:<WH7223> and I will write<WH3789> on these tables<WH3871> the words<WH1697> that were in the first<WH7223> tables,<WH3871> which<WH834> you brake.<WH7665>

And be ready<WH3559> in the morning,<WH1242> and come<WH5927> up in the morning<WH1242> to mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> and present<WH5324> yourself there<WH8033> to me in the top<WH7218> of the mount.<WH2022>

And no<WH3808> man<WH376> shall come<WH5927> up with you, neither<WH408> let any man<WH376> be seen<WH7200> throughout all<WH3605> the mount;<WH2022> neither<WH408> let the flocks<WH6629> nor<WH408> herds<WH1241> feed<WH7462> before<WH413> <WH4136> that mount.<WH2022>

And he hewed<WH6458> two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like to the first;<WH7223> and Moses<WH4872> rose<WH7925> up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and went<WH5927> up to mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> as the LORD<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> him, and took<WH3947> in his hand<WH3027> the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone.<WH68>
And the LORD<WH3068> descended<WH3381> in the cloud,<WH6051> and stood<WH3320> with him there,<WH8033> and proclaimed<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD<WH3068> passed<WH5674> by before<WH5921> <WH6440> him, and proclaimed,<WH7121> The LORD,<WH3068> The LORD<WH3068> God,<WH410> merciful<WH7349> and gracious,<WH2587> long-suffering,<WH750> <WH639> and abundant<WH7227> in goodness<WH2617> and truth,<WH571>

Keeping<WH5341> mercy<WH2617> for thousands,<WH505> forgiving<WH5375> iniquity<WH5771> and transgression<WH6588> and sin,<WH2402> and that will by no<WH3808> means clear<WH5352> the guilty; visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> on the children,<WH1121> and on the children's<WH1121> children, to the third<WH8029> and to the fourth<WH7256> generation.
And Moses<WH4872> made haste,<WH4422> and bowed<WH6915> his head toward the earth,<WH776> and worshipped.<WH7812>

And he said,<WH559> If<WH518> now<WH4994> I have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your sight,<WH5869> O LORD,<WH136> let my LORD,<WH136> I pray<WH4994> you, go<WH3212> among<WH7130> us; for it is a stiff necked<WH7186> <WH6203> people;<WH5971> and pardon<WH5545> our iniquity<WH5771> and our sin,<WH2403> and take us for your inheritance.<WH5157>

And he said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I make<WH3772> a covenant:<WH1285> before<WH5048> all<WH3605> your people<WH5971> I will do<WH6213> marvels,<WH6381> such as have not been done<WH1254> in all<WH3605> the earth,<WH776> nor in any<WH3605> nation:<WH1471> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> among<WH7130> which<WH834> you are shall see<WH7200> the work<WH4639> of the LORD:<WH3068> for it is a terrible<WH3372> thing that I will do<WH6213> with you.

Observe<WH8104> you that which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day:<WH3117> behold,<WH2005> I drive<WH1644> out before<WH6440> you the Amorite,<WH567> and the Canaanite,<WH3669> and the Hittite,<WH2850> and the Perizzite,<WH6522> and the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite.<WH2983>

Take heed<WH8104> to yourself, lest<WH6435> you make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> where<WH834> <WH5921> you go,<WH935> lest<WH6435> it be for a snare<WH4170> in the middle<WH7130> of you:
But you shall destroy<WH5422> their altars,<WH4196> break<WH7665> their images,<WH4676> and cut<WH3772> down their groves:<WH842>
For you shall worship<WH7812> no<WH3808> other<WH312> god:<WH410> for the LORD,<WH3068> whose name<WH8034> is Jealous,<WH7067> is a jealous<WH7067> God:<WH410>

Lest<WH6435> you make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> and they go a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> their gods,<WH430> and do sacrifice<WH2076> to their gods,<WH430> and one call<WH7121> you, and you eat<WH398> of his sacrifice;<WH2077>

And you take<WH3947> of their daughters<WH1323> to your sons,<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> go a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> their gods,<WH430> and make your sons<WH1121> go a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> their gods.<WH430>
You shall make<WH6213> you no<WH3808> molten<WH4541> gods.<WH430>

The feast<WH2282> of unleavened<WH4682> bread shall you keep.<WH8104> Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened<WH4682> bread, as I commanded<WH6680> you, in the time<WH4150> of the month<WH2320> Abib:<WH24> for in the month<WH2320> Abib<WH24> you came<WH3318> out from Egypt.<WH4714>
All<WH3605> that opens<WH6363> the matrix<WH7358> is mine; and every<WH3605> firstling<WH6363> among your cattle,<WH4735> whether ox<WH7794> or sheep,<WH7716> that is male.<WH2142>

But the firstling<WH6363> of an ass<WH2543> you shall redeem<WH6299> with a lamb:<WH7716> and if<WH518> you redeem<WH6299> him not, then shall you break<WH6202> his neck.<WH6203> All<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of your sons<WH1121> you shall redeem.<WH6299> And none<WH3808> shall appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> me empty.<WH7387>
Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> you shall work,<WH4399> but on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> you shall rest:<WH7673> in ripening<WH2758> time and in harvest<WH7105> you shall rest.<WH7673>

And you shall observe<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of weeks,<WH7620> of the first fruits<WH1061> of wheat<WH2406> harvest,<WH7105> and the feast<WH2282> of ingathering<WH614> at the year's<WH8141> end.<WH8622>
Thrice<WH7969> <WH6471> in the year<WH8141> shall all<WH3605> your male children<WH2138> appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> God,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

For I will cast<WH3423> out the nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> you, and enlarge<WH7337> your borders:<WH1366> neither<WH3808> shall any man<WH376> desire<WH2530> your land,<WH776> when you shall go<WH5927> up to appear<WH7200> before<WH413> <WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> thrice<WH7969> <WH6471> in the year.<WH8141>

You shall not offer<WH7819> the blood<WH1818> of my sacrifice<WH2077> with leaven;<WH2557> neither<WH3808> shall the sacrifice<WH2077> of the feast<WH2282> of the passover<WH6453> be left<WH3885> to the morning.<WH1242>

The first<WH7225> of the first fruits<WH1061> of your land<WH127> you shall bring<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430> You shall not seethe<WH1310> a kid<WH1423> in his mother's<WH517> milk.<WH2461>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Write<WH3789> you these<WH428> words:<WH1697> for after<WH5921> the tenor<WH6310> of these<WH428> words<WH1697> I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with you and with Israel.<WH3478>

And he was there<WH8033> with the LORD<WH3068> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights;<WH3915> he did neither<WH3808> eat<WH398> bread,<WH3899> nor<WH3808> drink<WH8354> water.<WH4325> And he wrote<WH3789> on the tables<WH3871> the words<WH1697> of the covenant,<WH1285> the ten<WH6235> commandments.<WH1697>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when Moses<WH4872> came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> with the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of testimony<WH5715> in Moses'<WH4872> hand,<WH3027> when he came<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mount,<WH2022> that Moses<WH4872> knew<WH3045> not that the skin<WH5785> of his face<WH6440> shone<WH7160> while he talked<WH1696> with him.

And when Aaron<WH175> and all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> Moses,<WH4872> behold,<WH2009> the skin<WH5785> of his face<WH6440> shone;<WH7160> and they were afraid<WH3372> to come<WH5066> near<WH5066> him.
And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> to them; and Aaron<WH175> and all<WH3605> the rulers<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> returned<WH7725> to him: and Moses<WH4872> talked<WH1696> with them.

And afterward<WH310> <WH3651> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH5066> near:<WH5066> and he gave them in commandment<WH6680> all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> with him in mount<WH2022> Sinai.<WH5514>
And till Moses<WH4872> had done<WH3615> speaking<WH1696> with them, he put<WH5414> a veil<WH4533> on<WH5921> his face.<WH6440>

But when Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> in before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> to speak<WH1696> with him, he took<WH5493> the veil<WH4533> off, until<WH5704> he came<WH3318> out. And he came<WH3318> out, and spoke<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that which<WH834> he was commanded.<WH6680>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> the face<WH6440> of Moses,<WH4872> that the skin<WH5785> of Moses'<WH4872> face<WH6440> shone:<WH7160> and Moses<WH4872> put<WH7725> the veil<WH4533> on his face<WH6440> again,<WH7725> until<WH5704> he went<WH935> in to speak<WH1696> with him.
